column1: #text=I used a small evergreen tree that I had purchased from a mail order company a few weeks before .
#text=Since it arrived just the day before , I had to plant it today , before it died .
#text=First I gathered up all the things I would need .
#text=I got my gloves , my shovel , my small trowel and my gardening apron , as well as some potting soil I had bought from the store earlier in the week .
#text=I carried all this to the spot I had picked out for my new tree .
#text=The first thing I did when I arrived at my spot was to take my shovel and dig a hole that was 12 inches deep .
#text=Next , I took the tree and removed that burlap sack that encased the roots , and placed the tree in the hole .
#text=I then used my small trowel to fill in the hole with the potting soil .
#text=After I was done I used the large shovel to tamp the dirt down around the tree , to pack it tight so the tree would n't fall over .
